data.Name: One Step Closer
data.Bio: One Step Closer is an American straight edge band from Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania, currently signed to Run For Cover Records. The band released a self-titled EP and a promo tape in 2017, followed by the highly-acclaimed EP, From Me To You in 2019 & a single; Promo 2020, in 2020. One Step Closer make clangy, emotionally wracked hardcore with a mid-â€™80s dchc influenced sound. BT- Bass Tommy- Guitar Ross- Guitar Tom- Drums Ryan- Vocals https://onestepcloserxxx.bandcamp.com Read more on Last.fm
